function startNFTSale(address contractAddress, uint price, uint tokenId) public
function startNFTAuction(address contractAddress, uint price, uint tokenId, uint deadline) public
function idToItemForSale(uint) public view returns (address, address, address, uint, uint, bool)
function idToItemForAuction(uint) public view returns (address, address, address, uint, uint, uint, uint, bool)
